description: When attempting to use MonkeyPatching to change the formatting of an existing object, the program throws a compile/runtime error stating that the formatting is not supported. The error occurs when the format keyword is used to try to change the formatting of the object, even though the object does not support
code:
#Python Program

#Importing modules
import string

#Function to format a given string
def format_string(string):
  #Converting the string to lowercase
  string = string.lower()
